name: Slime Colonies
description:
Spread the slimes through the solar system, combine new slime colors, upgrade the planets and even turn the sun into a black hole!

Made for the Blackthornprod game jam.

How to play:

Move the space ship with wasd or the cursor keys.

When landed on a planet or asteroid, move the mouse over slimes and hold down the left mouse button to collect them.

Planets require at least two slimes to produce new slimes.

Place different colored slimes on a planet to get new combinations (purple, yellow).

Black slimes reproduce by devouring other slimes on the planet.

The game has no audio.
